document.full_text: matt howard made one free throw with 0.8 seconds left to cap a wild final sequence, and butler added another amazing victory to its list of n.c.a.a. tournament upsets.
document.title: southeast: butler 71, pittsburgh 70: upset special: butler beats no. 1 seed pittsburgh
lines_and_colors: matt howard made one free throw with 0.8 seconds left to cap a wild final sequence, and butler added another amazing victory to its list of n.c.a.a. tournament upsets.
